task: Search for a recipe for Beef Wellington on Allrecipes that has at least 200 reviews and an average rating of 4.5 stars or higher. List the main ingredients required for the dish.
observation:
The most recent observations reveal that the user successfully located and opened a Beef Wellington recipe on Allrecipes that meets the criteria of over 200 reviews and an average rating of 4.5 stars. The recipe received 359 ratings with an average of 4.7 stars. The main ingredients for this Beef Wellington dish are:

- 2 1/2 pounds beef tenderloin
- 4 tablespoons butter, softened, divided
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1 onion, chopped
- 1/2 cup sliced fresh mushrooms
- 2 ounces liver pâté
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1 (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed
- 1 large egg yolk, beaten
- 1 (10.5 ounce) can beef broth
- 2 tablespoons red wine

These details are supported and supplemented by the visual context provided in the screenshots. For a full understanding of the task history and any earlier observations, it's recommended to refer to the complete task history.
